short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The companion extension to Reverse Source by OA2GSheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reverse Source by OA2Gsheets allows Amazon Sellers to easily reverse search an Amazon seller using a Keepa data subscription. Simply click the icon next to the sellers name and see a list of all their products. Requires a Keepa data subscription.
